name: Golang Authentication Service
achievement: Secure REST API built with Go featuring JWT-based authentication with access and refresh token mechanism, bcrypt password hashing, and middleware-based authorization. Implemented clean architecture with repository pattern, comprehensive request validation, and structured error handling following Go best practices.

name: Laravel Task Management API
achievement: Comprehensive task management REST API with Laravel Sanctum. Implements repository pattern, service layer architecture, role-based permissions, real-time notifications via queues, and efficient database queries with eager loading. Built with API resources for consistent JSON responses and comprehensive validation.

name: StockSense
achievement: Website for you manage your inventory like stocks, products, finance, and many more with realtime notification

name: Chatty
achievement: Website for you to chat with all of your friend with real time notification, and online users indicator

name: Pisonz Store
achievement: Built a online top up game store and can help you to buy your games items with tracking your order

name: Yamada Motorcycle
achievement: Static web created for Human Computer Interaction for mid exam evaluation

name: GSAP Awards
achievement: Award-inspired web experience featuring advanced GSAP animations with scroll-triggered sequences, parallax effects, and timeline orchestration. Demonstrates technical mastery of animation timing, easing functions, and performance optimization while maintaining smooth 60fps across all devices.

name: StreamFlix
achievement: One of my first React projects - a movie discovery interface demonstrating fundamental skills in component architecture, API integration, and responsive design. Built during my learning journey to understand modern frontend development patterns.
